trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When Nicodemus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Nicodemus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Nicodemus's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Devil Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Nicodemus's Darkvision

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Nicodemus regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn.

trait.name: Shadow Sight
entries: Nicodemus can as an action look through the shadow of any creature on the same plane of existence as him. In order to do this Nicodemus does not need to have met the creature only be aware of them. While looking through a shadow Nicodemus is still aware of his surroundings but has disadvantage on perception checks. This ability only works if the target is casting a shadow. it does not function if the target is in complete blackness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nicodemus makes three melee attacks

action.name: Tendril of Shadow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. On hit the target is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (Escape {@dc 16}). While {@condition restrained} the target takes {@damage 3d10} Necrotic damage at the start of each of Nicodemus turn. While {@condition grappled} by the Tendril, spell casters magic is suppressed. In order to cast any spells while {@condition grappled} a spellcaster must make a {@dc 15} Concentration Check. On a Success the spell goes off as normal, on a failure the spell fails and the spell slot is used.

action.name: Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 600/600 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 7d6 + 5}) damage of one of the following types (empyreanâ€™s choice): acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, radiant, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Nicodemus makes makes one saber or tendril attack.

legendary.name: Darkness
entries: Nicodemus extends his shadow out 30 feet, anyone caught in the shadow rolls a DC Wisdom save or be blind till the beginning of Nicodemus's next turn

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hound of Ill Omen
entries:
As a bonus action, Yonkic can spend 3 sorcery points to magically summon a hound of ill omen to target one creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The hound uses the dire wolf's stats with the following changes.
- Medium instead of large.
- Counts as monstrosity instead of beast
- Can move through objects and creatures as if difficult terrain.
- The hound automatically knows its target location even if it is hidden.
The hound appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within 30 feet of the target. Roll initiative for the hound. On its turn, it can move only toward its target by the most direct route, and it can use its action only to attack its target. The hound can make opportunity attacks, but only against its target. Additionally, while the hound is within 5 feet of the target, the target has disadvantage on saving throws against any spell you cast. The hound disappears if it is reduced to 0 hit points, if its target is reduced to 0 hit points, or after 5 minutes.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: Yonkic has 14 sorcery points to spend on metamagic or to regain spells

trait.name: Twinned Spell
entries: When Yonkic casts a spell that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self, he can spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to target a second creature in range with the same spell (Minimum 1).

trait.name: Seek Spell
entries: If Yonkic makes an attack roll for a spell and misses, he can spend 2 sorcery points to reroll the d20, he must use the new roll. He can use Seeking Spell even if he has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

trait.name: Empowered Spell
entries: When Yonkic rolls damage for a spell, he can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 5 of those dice. He must use the new rolls. He can use Empowered Spell even if he has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

trait.name: Strength of the Grave
entries: When damage reduces Yonkic to 0 hit points, he can make a Charisma saving throw (DC 5 + the damage taken). On a success, he instead drop to 1 hit point. He can't use this feature if he is reduced to 0 hit points by radiant damage or by a critical hit. After the saving throw succeeds, he can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

trait.name: Shadow Walk
entries: Yonkic can step from one shadow into another. When he is in dim light or darkness, as a bonus action, he can magically teleport up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see that is also in dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Yonkic is a 14th-level spellcaster. Yonkic's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Yonkic has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

action.name: Momentary Stasis (5/Day)
entries: Nesrith can magically force a large or smaller creature she can see within 60 feet of her to make a Constitution saving throw against her DC 18. Unless the saving throw is a success, the creature is encased in a field of magical energy until the end of her next turn or until the creature takes any damage. While encased in this way, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

trait.name: Temporal Awareness
entries: Nesrith can add her Intelligence modifier to her initiative rolls.

trait.name: Arcane Abeyance (1/Day)
entries:
When Nesrith casts a spell using a spell slot of 4th level or lower, she can condense the spell's magic into a mote. The spell is frozen in time at the moment of casting and held within a gray bead for 1 hour. This bead is a Tiny object with AC 15 and 1 hit point, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage. When the duration ends, or if the bead is destroyed, it vanishes in a flash of light, and the spell is lost.

A creature holding the bead can use its action to release the spell within, whereupon the bead disappears. The spell uses her spell attack bonus and save DC, and the spell treats the creature who released it as the caster for all other purposes.

reaction.name: Chronal Shift (2/Day)
entries: Nesrith can magically exert limited control over the flow of time around a creature. As a reaction, after Nesrith or a creature she can see within 30 feet of her makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, she can force the creature to reroll. She makes this decision after she sees whether the roll succeeds or fails. The target must use the result of the second roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nesrith is a 12th-level spellcaster. Nesrith's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Nesrith has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xyriel can make 4 attacks

action.name: Flame Tongue Longsword
entries:
{@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 0}) piercing damage.

Xyriel can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until Xyriel uses a bonus action to speak the command word again or until he drops or sheathes the sword.

action.name: Psionic Strike
entries: Xyriel can propel his weapons with psionic force. Once on each of his turns, immediately after he hits a target within 30 feet of him with an attack and deal damage to it with a weapon, he can expend one Psionic Energy die, rolling it and dealing force damage to the target equal to the number rolled plus 2.

action.name: Telekinetic Movement (1/Day)
entries: Xyriel can move an object or a creature with his mind. As an action, he can target one loose object that is Large or smaller or one willing creature, other than himself. If he can see the target and it is within 30 feet of him, he can move it up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Alternatively, if it is a Tiny object, he can move it to or from his hand. Either way, he can move the target horizontally, vertically, or both. Xyriel can expend a Psionic Energy die to take this ability again again.

trait.name: Last Stand Armor
entries: Xyriel has a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor, which shimmers softly. If Xyriel dies while wearing the armor, it is destroyed, and each celestial, fey, and fiend within 30 feet of you must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be banished to its home plane of existence, unless it is already there.

trait.name: Shield of Uven Rune
entries: Effects already imbedded in sheet

trait.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries: When Xyriel rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack he makes with a melee weapon that he is wielding with two hands, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for him to gain this benefit.

trait.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries: When Xyriel deals damage to a target with his Psionic Strike, he can force the target to make a Strength saving throw against a DC 15. If the save fails, he can knock the target prone or move it up to 10 feet in any direction horizontally.

trait.name: Psychic Dice
entries: Xyriel harbors a wellspring of psionic energy within himself. This energy is represented by 10 psionic energy dice, each is a d10. Certain abilities use these dice and they are replenished at dawn.

trait.name: Shield - Bane (1/Day)
entries: Xyriel can cast the bane spell from the shield (save DC 17). The spell does not require concentration and lasts for 1 minute.

trait.name: Second Wind (1/Day)
entries: Xyriel has a limited well of stamina that he can draw on to protect himself from harm. On his turn, he can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

trait.name: Action Surge (1/Day)
entries: On Xyriel's turn, he can take one additional action.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Xyriel can reroll a saving throw that he fails. If he does so, he must use the new roll.

trait.name: Psi-Powered Leap (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, Xyriel can propel his body with his mind. He gains a flying speed equal to twice his walking speed until the end of the current turn. He can expend a Psionic Energy die to take it again.

reaction.name: Shield - Deadly Rebuke
entries: Immediately after a creature hits Xyriel with a melee attack, he can use his reaction to deal 3d6 necrotic damage to that creature.

reaction.name: Protective Field
entries: When Xyriel or another creature he can see within 30 feet of him takes damage, he can use his reaction to expend one Psionic Energy die, roll the die, and reduce the damage taken by the number rolled plus 2, as you create a momentary shield of telekinetic force.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Urograx can make two attacks, 3 with rage.

action.name: Sword of Wounding
entries:
{@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

Once per turn, when Urograx hits a creature with an attack using this magic weapon, he can wound the target. At the start of each of the wounded creature's turns, it takes ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage for each time you've wounded it, and it can then make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, ending the effect of all such wounds on itself on a success. Alternatively, the wounded creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to make a DC 15 Wisdom (Medicine) check, ending the effect of such wounds on it on a success.

action.name: Animated Shield
entries: While holding this shield, Urograx can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to animate. The shield leaps into the air and hovers in his space to protect him as if he were wielding it, leaving his hands free. The shield remains animated for 1 minute, until he uses a bonus action to end this effect, or until he is incapacitated or dies, at which point the shield falls to the ground or into his hand if he has one free.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Urograx exhales acid in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Rage
entries:
Urograx can rage 5 times per day. While raging, Urograx gains the following benefits:

- Urograx has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. 
- When Urograx makes a melee weapon attack using Strength, Urograx gains a +3 bonus to the damage roll.
- Urograx has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Danger Sense
entries: Urograx has an uncanny sense of when things nearby aren't as they should be, giving Urograx an edge when he dodges away from danger. Urograx has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that he can see, such as traps and spells. To gain this benefit, he can't be blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Urograx can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Feral Instincts
entries: Urograx has advantage on initiative rolls. Additionally, if Urograx is surprised at the beginning of combat and isn't incapacitated, he can act normally on his first turn, but only if he enters rage before doing anything else on that turn.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: Urograx can roll two additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

trait.name: Relentless Rage
entries: Rage can keep Urograx fighting despite grievous wounds. If he drops to 0 hit points while you're raging and doesn't die outright, he can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. If he succeeds, he drops to 1 hit point instead. Each time he uses this feature after the first, the DC increases by 5.

trait.name: Mindless Rage
entries: Urograx can't be charmed or frightened while raging. If he is charmed or frightened when he enters rage, the effect is suspended for the duration of the rage

reaction.name: Instinctive Pounce
entries: When a creature ends its turn within 15 feet of Urograx, he can use his reaction to move up to half his speed to a space closer to the creature. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: When Urograx takes damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of him, he can use his reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.
Half Dragon - Acid

action.name: Multiattack
entries: If Vorrash attacks with the Psychic Blade he can make an additional attack as a bonus action but the damage is 1d4 instead of 1d6.

action.name: Psychic Blade
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage in melee, or 88 ({@damage 1d6 + 5})  piercing damage at range.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rend Mind
entries: Vorrash can sweep his Psychic Blades directly through a creature's mind. When he uses his Psychic Blades to deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature, he can force that target to make a Wisdom saving throw (18). If the save fails, the target is stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Vorrash can expend three Psionic Energy dice to use this ability again.

action.name: Psychic Teleportation
entries: As a bonus action, Vorrash can manifest one of his Psychic Blades, expend one Psionic Energy die and roll it, and throw the blade at an unoccupied space he can see, up to a number of feet away equal to 10 times the number rolled. He then teleports to that space, and the blade vanishes.

action.name: Psychic Veil
entries:
Vorrash can weave a veil of psychic static to mask himself. As an action, he can magically become invisible, along with anything he is wearing or carrying, for 1 hour or until he dismisses this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends early immediately after he deals damage to a creature or he forces a creature to make a saving throw.
He can expend a Psionic Energy die to use this feature again.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Vorrash deals an extra 7d6 damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Vorrash that isn't incapacitated and Vorrash doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Psychic Dice
entries: Vorrash harbors a wellspring of psionic energy within himself. This energy is represented by Psionic Energy dice, he can use 10 of these a day and each are a d10.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Vorrash can take a bonus action on each of his turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Vorrash is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Vorrash instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Blindsense
entries: Vorrash is aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of him.

trait.name: Homing Strikes
entries: If Vorrash makes an attack roll with his Psychic Blades and misses the target, he can roll one Psionic Energy die and add the number rolled to the attack roll. If this causes the attack to hit, he expends the Psionic Energy die.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker that Vorrash can see hits him with an attack, he can use his reaction to halve the attack's damage against him.

monster.name: Mutated Otyugh

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The otyugh makes four attacks: one with its bite or swallow and three with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.name: Swallow
entries:
The otyugh makes one bite Attack against a Large or smaller target it is Grappling. If the Attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is Blinded and Restrained, it has total cover against Attacks and other Effects outside the otyugh, and it takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage at the start of each of the mutated otyugh's turns. The otyugh can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the otyugh dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained by it and can Escape from the corpse using 5 feet of Movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 50 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has three tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.

action.name: Spew Acid (5-6)
entries: The otyugh spews liquid acid in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 ft. of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting. If a creature is {@condition grappled} with its claw the scorpion can instead a pincer attack on that creature instead of a claw attack

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/300 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the scorpions next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d10 + 2}) damage.

trait.name: King's Glory
entries: The sand king has advantage on attack rolls against a {@condition poisoned} creature

trait.name: Monstrous Presence
entries: Any hostile creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the sand king must succeed a {@dc 18} wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of him until the start of the next turn

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the sand king fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sand king makes two Ravenous Claw or Royal Spear attacks and one Deadly Sting attack.

action.name: Ravenous Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) acid damage

action.name: Royal Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Deadly Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 150/300 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: For Glory (3/Day)
entries: Each creature of the sand kings choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by this ability, gains advantage on attack rolls until the start of the sand king's next turn.

reaction.name: King's Reaction (1/Day)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the sand king makes an attack roll, but before learning whether it hits or misses, the sand king can grant the creature +10 bonus to that roll.

legendary.name: Inspire
entries: The sand king can inspire any ally he can see to immediately take an extra attack.

entries.name: Lair Actions
entries: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the sand king takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the sand king can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: A large dust devil appears on a location and pulls any creature at a height of 50 ft toward the ground. Any creature in the dust devil must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be pulling toward the ground and knocked {@condition prone}.

A creature within 120 ft of the sand king that he can see will be encased by sand in a desert coffin. The creature must succeed on (@dc 18} Dexterity saving or be restrained, blinded, deafened, and silenced. Any creature caught in the desert coffin can use their action to succeed on a {@dc 18} strength saving throw to break free. Otherwise the sand naturally falls away after 1 minute.

The sand king kicks sand 50 ft into the air in a 120 foot radius around him causing any creature caught in it to be blind. Any creature inside of it will be fully obscured for a round until the sand settle back down. In addition all creatures inside who cast spells must make a concentration check to maintain or cast spells while inhaling sand into their lungs.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The bandit can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The catoblepas makes two attacks: one with its hooves, and one with its horns.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: The Abyss Stares Back {@recharge 5}
entries: The catoblepas stares into the soul of one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: The thornlock druid gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The druid makes two attacks and casts a spell

action.name: Slam (Shillelagh)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Change Shape (2/Day)
entries: The druid magically polymorphs into a beast or elemental with a challenge raiting of 8 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. The druid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The druid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls {@condition unconscious}. The druid can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn.

While in a new form, the druid retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, and Desterity are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. It can cast its spells with verbal and somatic components in its new form.
The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks)

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Rurik can take a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Leader's Presence
entries: Friendly bandits within 30 feet of Rurik gain advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rurik makes two melee attacks with his greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Rurik can use his reaction to add 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, he must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Twinned Daggers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) damage.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Add {@dice 1d6} when Mara has advantage or the target is engaged with another player

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: Once per short rest, regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10 + 3}.

trait.name: Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting)
entries: When rolling damage for a melee weapon attack that you make with a two-handed weapon, you can reroll a 1 or 2 on damage dice.

trait.name: Action Surge
entries: Once per short rest, take an additional action on your turn.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) damage.
Equipment
- **Weapon:** Greataxe
- **Armor:** Chainmail
- **Other:** Explorer's pack, Smith's tools, Brewer's supplies, 10 gold pieces

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The larkin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the larkin to sleep.

trait.name: Nimble Movement
entries: Can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The seraphina embereye has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the seraphina embereye to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The seraphina embereye has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Seraphina makestwo attacks

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The polar bear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Surprise Attack (Bugbear)
entries: If the polar bear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Polar Bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Furious Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Frost Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Varek has advantage on saving throws against poison, and he has resistance against poison damage.

trait.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, Varek can utter a special command or warning whenever a non-hostile creature he can see within 30 feet makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand Varek. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Varek is incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Varek makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, or 13 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Warforged Beetle
languages: understands and speaks the languages of its creator

trait.name: Random Elemental Power
entries: Each warforged beetle has one random elemental power, determined at the time of its creation. Roll a {@dice d4} to determine the elemental power:
1. Fire: The beetle has resistance to fire damage.
2. Ice: The beetle has resistance to cold damage.
3. Lightning: The beetle has resistance to lightning damage.
4. Acid: The beetle has resistance to acid damage.

trait.name: Adaptive Armor
entries: After taking damage of a specific type, the beetle gains resistance to that damage type until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beetle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its saw blade.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Saw Blade
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 75/150 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Elemental Charge
entries: When the beetle takes 20 or more damage in a single turn, it becomes charged with elemental energy. At the start of its next turn, it can release this energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) elemental damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The type of damage is the same as the beetle's Random Elemental Power.

action.name: Burrow Ambush
entries: As an action, the beetle can burrow into the ground and move up to 20 feet. If it ends its movement within 5 feet of a creature, it can make a surprise attack with its saw blade.

monster.name: Advanced Warforged Beetle
languages: understands the languages of its creator but cannot speak

trait.name: Random Elemental Power
entries: Each warforged beetle has one random elemental power, determined at the time of its creation. Roll a {@dice d4} to determine the elemental power:
1. Fire: The beetle deals an additional {@dice 1d6} fire damage with its attacks. It also has resistance to fire damage.
2. Ice: The beetle deals an additional {@dice 1d6} cold damage with its attacks. It also has resistance to cold damage.
3. Lightning: The beetle deals an additional {@dice 1d6} lightning damage with its attacks. It also has resistance to lightning damage.
4. Acid: The beetle deals an additional {@dice 1d6} acid damage with its attacks. It also has resistance to acid damage.

trait.name: Adaptive Armor
entries: After taking damage of a specific type, the beetle gains resistance to that damage type until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beetle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its saw blade.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) elemental damage (type based on Random Elemental Power).

action.name: Saw Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) elemental damage (type based on Random Elemental Power).

action.name: Elemental Charge
entries: When the beetle takes 20 or more damage in a single turn, it becomes charged with elemental energy. At the start of its next turn, it can release this energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) elemental damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The type of damage is the same as the beetle's Random Elemental Power.

action.name: Burrow Ambush
entries: As an action, the beetle can burrow into the ground and move up to 20 feet. If it ends its movement within 5 feet of a creature, it can make a surprise attack with its saw blade.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Lyra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lyra makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Favored Enemy
entries: Brak has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track his favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brak makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During his first turn, Kael has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasnâ€™t taken a turn. Any hit Kael scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Kael deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Kael that isnâ€™t incapacitated and Kael doesnâ€™t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kael makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Freezing Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the ice elemental takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The ice elemental can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesnâ€™t cost it extra movement.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ice elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The ice elemental exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Stonecrusher
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesnâ€™t disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Elemental Heart (Corruption)
entries: The Elemental Heart embedded in Stonecrusherâ€™s chest grants him additional powers but also causes instability:
- **Increased Power:** Stonecrusher's melee attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d8} elemental (force) damage.

- **Unstable Energy:** At the end of each of his turns, there is a 25% chance (roll a {@dice d4}, on a 1) that Stonecrusher emits a burst of energy, causing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage to all creatures within 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage.

action.name: Earthquake (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The elemental strikes the ground, creating a localized earthquake. All creatures within 20 feet of the elemental must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not knocked prone.

action.name: Energy Burst (Triggered by Instability)
entries: At the end of each of Stonecrusherâ€™s turns, there is a 25% chance he releases a burst of unstable energy. Each creature within 10 feet must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The elemental can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Corrupted Aura
entries: At the start of each of the elementalâ€™s turns, each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and be poisoned until the start of the elemental's next turn.

trait.name: Mire Stride
entries: The elemental can move through nonmagical difficult terrain made of earth, mud, or water without expending extra movement. It can also pass through solid earth or stone as if it were difficult terrain.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The elemental regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and is in contact with water or mud.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage and have its Strength score reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Mire Wave {@recharge 5-6}
entries: The elemental causes a wave of corrupted water and mud to surge out in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain until cleared.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the ooze or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter a Medium or smaller creature's space. Whenever the ooze enters a creature's space, the creature must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw.
On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the ooze's turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 13} Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The corrupted centipede makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its venomous tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Venomous Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Corrupting Spit {@recharge 5-6}
entries: The centipede spits a line of corrosive acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Venomous Spray {@recharge 5-6}
entries: The snake spits a cone of venomous spray in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Corrupted Animated Armor
languages: understands the languages of its creator but cannot speak

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the Corrupted Animated Armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

trait.name: Corruption Aura
entries: At the start of the Corrupted Animated Armorâ€™s turn, any creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage and be poisoned until the start of the armorâ€™s next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is not poisoned.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Corrupted Animated Armor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

action.name: Corrupted Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: The Corrupted Animated Armor channels dark energy into its attack. It makes a single Slam attack. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of the armorâ€™s next turn.

trait.name: Psychic Blades
entries: When Darin hits a target with a weapon attack, he can deal an extra {@damage 3d6} psychic damage.

trait.name: Words of Terror
entries: Once per short rest, Darin can speak to a creature for 1 minute. At the end of the conversation, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Darin for 1 hour.

trait.name: Mantle of Whispers
entries: When a humanoid dies within 30 feet of Darin, he can capture its shadow. Using the shadow, he can disguise himself as that humanoid for 1 hour, gaining access to some of its memories.

trait.name: Psychic Blades
entries: When Lyra hits with a weapon attack, she can deal an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Darin is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Psychic Blades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: At the start of the first turn of combat, Brak's walking speed increases by 10 feet and he makes an extra attack that deals an additional 1d8 damage.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: Brak is invisible to any creature that relies on darkvision to see him while he is in darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brak makes two attacks with his longbow or scimitar.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Hunter's Mark (Bonus Action)
entries: Brak can mark a target within 90 feet. He deals an additional 1d6 damage to the target and has advantage on Perception and Survival checks to find it.

trait.name: Portent
entries: Arcturus can foresee the future. At the start of each day, he rolls two d20s. These can replace any attack roll, saving throw, or ability check made by him or a creature he can see.

trait.name: Arcane Recovery
entries: Once per day during a short rest, Arcturus can recover up to 5 levels worth of spell slots.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Arcturus is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: Arcturus can use his action to unleash a blast of arcane energy. Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.

trait.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: At the start of the first turn of combat, Kael's walking speed increases by 10 feet and he makes an extra attack that deals an additional {@damage 1d8} damage.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: Kael is {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on darkvision to see him while he is in darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kael makes two attacks with his longbow or scimitar.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Hunter's Mark
entries: Kael can mark a target within 90 feet. He deals an additional {@damage 1d6} damage to the target and has advantage on Perception and Survival checks to find it.

trait.name: Portent
entries: Arcturus can foresee the future. At the start of each day, he rolls two d20s. These can replace any attack roll, saving throw, or ability check made by him or a creature he can see.

trait.name: Arcane Recovery
entries: Once per day during a short rest, Arcturus can recover up to 5 levels worth of spell slots.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Arcturus is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: Arcturus can use his action to unleash a blast of arcane energy {@atk Ranged Spell Attack} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The wyvern doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Aerial Dive
entries: If the wyvern moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute.

action.name: Elemental Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The wyvern exhales a blast of elemental energy. Depending on the type, this could be a blast of lightning or a torrent of water.

Lightning Wyvern: Exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Water Wyvern: Exhales a torrent of freezing water in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The Warforged Guard has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and it doesnâ€™t need to eat, drink, or breathe.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Warforged Guard is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Warforged Guard has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magically Reinforced Armor
entries: When the Warforged Guard is reduced to half of its hit points, it gains resistance to all damage (except force damage) for 3 rounds. This ability recharges after a short rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Warforged Guard makes three attacks: one with its Heavy Slam and two with its Blade Arm.

action.name: Heavy Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Blade Arm
entries: {@atk mw} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Cannon Blast (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The Warforged Guard uses its cannon to release elemental energy. The Guard chooses one of the following options:

Fire Cannon: The Guard shoots a 30-foot cone of fire. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

Force Cannon: The Guard shoots a 60-foot line of force energy that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one, and is knocked back 10 feet.

reaction.name: Reactive Armor Plating
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the Warforged Guard hits it with a melee attack, the Guard can release a shockwave from its armor. The attacker must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage.

trait.name: Magical Resistance
entries: The Automaton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Heavy Plating
entries: When the Automaton is at half hit points or below, it gains resistance to all damage except force damage.

trait.name: Relentless Construction
entries: Once per short rest, when the Automaton is reduced to 0 hit points, it can make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a success, it regains 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Automaton makes two attacks: one with its Saw Blade Arm and one with its Energy Cannon.

action.name: Saw Blade Arm
entries: {@atk mw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Energy Cannon (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The Automaton releases a blast of elemental energy from its integrated cannon. The Automaton chooses between fire or lightning damage.

Fire Cannon: The Automaton fires a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

Lightning Cannon: The Automaton fires a 30-foot line of lightning that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

reaction.name: Defensive Overcharge
entries: When the Automaton is hit by a melee attack, it can use its reaction to release a pulse of energy. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage.
